venue.name: the Hallmark Museum of Contemporary Photography

item.description:
You and your guests are invited to join us
for an afternoon Opening Reception
featuring an exhibition by Members of
Hallmark Institute of Photography's Current Class

Hallmark's Class of 2010
MySight

Saturday December 12, 2009
1:00pm to 5:00pm

85 Avenue A, Turners Falls, Massachusetts.

Reception, exhibition, and live music.

This event is free of charge.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Exhibition by Members of Hallmark Institute of Photography's Current Class
